Event.name: Defending
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Defender</fen> responds to an <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack on a <fen>Victim</fen> by directly, and usually violently, countering it.
<ex><fex name="def">Samantha</fex> <fex name="man">stalwartly</fex> <t>defended</t> <fex name="vic">the gateway</fex> <fex name="assail">from the wraiths</fex>, <fex name="dep">crouching low over Stephen's prone form</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Defender
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is the being or entity that responds forcefully to the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack. </def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity used by the <fen>Defender</fen> fend off the <fen>Assailant</fen> . </def-root>

Arg.name: Assailant
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Defender</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Defender</fen> that accomplishes their defense of the <fen>Victim</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Defender</fen> defends the <fen>Victim</fen> from the <fen>Assailant</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Defender</fen> defends the <fen>Victim</fen> from the <fen>Assailant</fen>. <ex>John <t>defended</t> the bear <fex name="Purpose">to prove his manhood</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Defender</fen> is responding to that leads them to protect the <fen>Victim</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the time when the Defender takes forceful action against the Assailant.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Location_of_protagonist
Arg.definition: <def-root>The starting-point of the motion of the <fen>Defender</fen> or projectiles of the <fen>Defender</fen> as they move toward the the <fen>Place</fen> that the <fen>Assailant</fen> is occupying. In prepositional phrases, the prepositional object expresses the starting point of motion. </def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Defender</fen> or <fen>Victim</fen> during the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.</def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual or entity that is under attack from the <fen>Assailant</fen> .</def-root>

Arg.name: Location_of_assailant
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location of the <fen>Assailant</fen> or the weapons of the <fen>Assailant</fen>.
<ex>We have to take out their <fex name="sou">air</fex> <t>defenses</t> first.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: defend.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: resist an attack on; protect from harm or danger.

lexUnit.name: defense.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action of defending from or resisting attack.

lexUnit.name: defensive.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: used or intended to defend

lexUnit.name: hold.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: defend, especially a fortified area.

lexUnit.name: biodefense.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: defense specifically concerned with biological agents
